bug.author: luiscarbonell
bug.description: Neuron function does not create a new neuron. It passes a reference to same neuron. Need to create a better factory function.

comments.comment: Will implement factory function that returns instance of a neuron. Referencing Eric Elliot's JavaScript Factory Functions: <denchmark-link:https://medium.com/javascript-scene/javascript-factory-functions-with-es6-4d224591a8b1>https://medium.com/javascript-scene/javascript-factory-functions-with-es6-4d224591a8b1</denchmark-link>
